content.description: Start in large right facing dihedral climb up under big roof (avoid loose block). Escape left (crux),Shallow pro and pumpy. Continue up blunt arete. Finish up steep cracks. Belay from tree. Walk off.
content.location: You'll find this route on the left side of a small cliff capped by a large roof. Approach by walking up the steep "trail" on the right side of Water Wall, then heading up canyon towards visible wall.

content.description: Start on or below large block. Move left in horizontal crack then up steep side pulls to a bolt.Follow thin crack, moves, and pro up to a second bolt. Climb the steep rock above bolt then finish up Gunky Monkey. Belay from tree and walk off. It is also possible to rap off (and top rope) from big tree above roof in the middle of the cliff, right of these two routes.
content.location:
Located left of the Gunky Monkey corner. Look for two bolts one low and the second higher and a thin crack in vertical face.

 Approach by walking up the steep "trail" on the right side of Water Wall, then heading up canyon towards visible wall.
